LanguageData.Tutor.label: チュートリアルを隠す
LanguageData.Cassandra.label: カサンドラ クラシック
LanguageData.Cassandra.description: Cassandra creates story events on a classic increasing curve of challenge and tension. She'll push you with dangerous events, then give breathing room, then come back to push once more.
LanguageData.Phoebe.label: フェーベ ベースビルダー
LanguageData.Phoebe.description: フェーベは、あなたが自分の植民地を建設するのに十分な時間を与えます。しかし、注意してください－高い難易度スケールを選んだならば、彼女は、他の誰とでも同じくらい手ひどく打ちます。
LanguageData.Randy.label: ランディ ランダム
LanguageData.Randy.description: Randy doesn't follow rules. He'll generate random events, and he doesn't care if they make a story of triumph or utter hopelessness. It's all drama to him.\n\nWarning: Since Randy is truly random, he will sometimes send extremely difficult or unfair groups of events at you. It makes for high drama - and unavoidable sacrifices.
